front.title: "MPLS LSP Ping TLVs and sub-TLVs registry"

abstract.t: This document addresses issues with the structure, allocation policies and clarity in the use of the "TLVs and sub-TLVs" of the "Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Paths (LSPs) Ping Parameters" in the "Multiprotocol Label Switching Architecture (MPLS)" name space. This document does not change any existing allocations and the new structure is backwards compatible with the existing registries. The policy for the allocation of TLVs is unchanged but future allocations of sub-TLVs will come from a single namespace, common to all TLVs of LSP Ping Parameters.
